name: node-crud-rest-api
description: This project intends to practice on creating a CRUD RESTful API in a Node.js environment running on an Express.js server and using a PostgreSQL database. It connects an Express.js server with PostgreSQL using node-postgres. The API will be able to handle the HTTP request methods that correspond to the PostgreSQL database from which the API gets its data.
author: Jordy Araujo
